WorkItem.Description:
I need to display information from SQL in Excel quite often.  I opened Excel and imported data from Excel while the Excel macro function was enabled.  I put this macro in a VB.NET project.  The macro is attached.

I keep getting an error on the first line.

Would you give me sample code that imports data from SQL to Excel using .NET Interop?

Thank you
WorkItem.Summary: Excel import from SQL using .NET interop
